title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7410.28 - Health systems records and data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7410.28 - Health systems records and data

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall prevent access, including but
not limited to telephonic consultation, by the commission, or any employee
designated by the chairman of the commission, pertaining to any resident's
medical treatment, to any and all records maintained by OCFS or any secure
facility, or to any information from any OCFS employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7410.28

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
